checkItems.itemName: Are internal floors/flooring free from slip and trip hazards?
Are external areas even and free from holes/loose slabs?
Are steps, ramps and stairs in good condition?
Are external access routes free from steep slopes which could be hazardous in icy conditions?
Is access in general free from hazards?
Are there no apparent electrical hazards e.g. dodgy wiring, very old switches?
Is there sufficient lighting inlcuding internal and external artificial light, to safely perform tasks required?
Is the house free from pets/pests?
checkItems.furtherTitle: If no, give details. Give details of any concerns e.g. dangerous dogs

checkItems.itemName: Do occupants avoid smoking while you are in the house?
Is the neighbourhood one that you would feel comfortable visiting at all times of day?
Would you rate the risk of violence or abuse from the occupants as 'Low'?
Is the client free from known infection risks?
Is there a mobile phone signal throughout the areas of the property you visit?
Are there any hazards related to the work you do e.g. patient handling with insufficient space/incorrect equipment, use of cleaning chemicals, sharps, etc?
Is there any equipment provided for your use at the property, e.g. by your employer, by another organisation or by the client?
checkItems.furtherTitle: If yes, is the equipment properly maintained?

items.remedialAction: None - ceilings in Bag End are quite low

items.task: A work rate imposed by a process?
Hazard those with a health problem?
Is movement or posture hindered by clothing or personal protective equipment?

whenRequired: Before, during and after second breakfast
